overview: A boxing ring becomes the center of love and heartbreak in this action drama. Tin Ha and Kin Fung are about to be engaged, but to make it happen, Kin must defeat her father, a legendary boxer, in a boxing battle.

production_companies.name: youyo Sunshine picture & Advertising Co., Ltd

tagline: No one has the right to take away my boxing gym.
title: A Girl Boxer
